mapper.select: SELECT MCD.COMPANY_CD , MCD.COMPANY_NM , MCD.DIVISION_CD , MCD.DIVISION_NM , MSC.CHANGE_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MSC.COMPANY_CD, MSC.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0020', MSC.CHANGE_TYPE, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS CHANGE_TYPE_NM , MSO.SO_NO , MSO.SO_SEQ , MSO.SO_TYPE , MSO.SO_TYPE_NM , MSO.CUSTOMER_CD , MSO.CUSTOMER_NM , MSO.ITEM_ID , MSO.ITEM_NM , MSO.ITEM_TYPE , MSO.ITEM_SPEC , MSC.CHANGE_DATE_YN , MSC.CHANGE_QTY_YN , MSC.BC_SHIPPING_DATE , MSC.BC_ORDER_QTY , MSC.AC_SHIPPING_DATE , MSC.AC_ORDER_QTY , MSC.SALES_ORDER_ID , MSC.UPDATE_BY ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MSC.COMPANY_CD, MSC.DIVISION_CD, MSC.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATEBYNM , TO_CHAR(MSC.UPDATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM MOM_COM_DIV_V MCD , MOM_SO_CHANGE MSC , MOM_SALES_ORDER_V MSO WHERE MCD.COMPANY_CD = MSC.COMPANY_CD AND MCD.DIVISION_CD = MSC.DIVISION_CD AND MSC.COMPANY_CD = MSO.COMPANY_CD AND MSC.DIVISION_CD = MSO.DIVISION_CD AND MSC.SALES_ORDER_ID = MSO.SALES_ORDER_ID
